title: Auto journalist Jim Resnick
description:
Jim Resnick has been writing about cars for almost 30 years for publications like Forbes, Wired, Arstechnica, and more. He's seen and driven a lot, and is one of our favorite people. Keep up with all his writing at https://twitter.com/jimresnick1?lang=en

This episode is available as a video! https://youtu.be/fQuheZqj5WU

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @jimresnick1

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
